short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarise article content from the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Omniclipper enables you to quickly summarise the content of any article. Please note there is no sign up in the extension - you must have an existing Omniclipper organisation account to be able to use this tool.
